sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SALADIN, a famous ſultan of Egypt, equally renowned as a warrior and legiſlator. He ſupported himſelf by his valour, and the influence of his amiable character, againſt the united efforts of the chief Chriſtian potentates of Europe, who carried on the molt unjuſt wars againſt him, under the falſe appellation of Holy Wars. See the articles Egypt and Croisade.
